text: Action CON Teleport up to 18m and deal 1d6+4 Thunder damage in a small AOE when you appears Deal 1d6+4 dmg/level X X

name: Thunderwave
text: Action 3 turns CON Deal 1d12+4 in a 3m cone AOE, Inflicts Reverberate and push back targets 9m on failed save. On Save half damage Deal 1d12+4 dmg/level X X

name: Transposition
text: Bonus CHA Forcibly teleport another creature to an area you can see on failed save No upcasting X X

name: Unseen Servant
text: Bonus Until Long Rest Summon an invisible servant. Can interact with the environment No upcasting X X

name: Vampiric Touch
text: Action On melee hit, deal 1d12+4 necrotic damage and regain half as many HP Deal 1d12+4 dmg/level X X

name: Vitriolic Touch
text: Action 3 turns No save On melee hit, deal 1d12 +4 acid damage and lower AC by 2 Deal 1d12+4 dmg/level X X

name: Wall of Fire
text: Action (C) Until Long Rest DEX Deal 1d12 fire damage inside the wall On Save: half damage Deal 1d12 dmg/level X X

name: Wall of Ice
text: Action (C) 1 turn (frozen) No save 9m AOE Wall of ice which Freezes creatures within X X

name: Wall of Stone
text: Action (C) Until Long Rest Raise a wall of solid stone, 9m AOE X X

name: Wall of Thorns
text: Action (C) Until Long Rest No save Raise a 9m wall of thorns. Creatures passing by the wall are Off-Balanced and Movement Speed is quartered X X

name: Ward of Vitality
text: Bonus 3 turns Target gains Advantage on all Saving Throws Select +1 target/level X X

name: Warding Bond
text: Bonus (C) Until Long Rest Target gain Resistance to ALL damage. When the ally takes damage, you take the same amount Select +1 target/level X X

name: Warding Winds
text: Action (C) Until Long Rest Clear clouds in 3m radius, create difficult terrain, ranged attacks against creatures inside are rolled with Disadvantage No upcasting X X

name: Water walk
text: Bonus (C) Until Long Rest Every ally in a 3m AOE around you ignore surfaces Increase area by 3m/level X X

name: Web
text: Bonus (C) 1Turn (enweb) DEX Create a 3m AOE surface, enwebs targets on save Increase AOE by 3m/level X X

name: Wind Walk
text: Action Until Long Rest Transform yourself and nearby allies in mist. Become Resistant to non-magical damage, become tiny in size, can't act. ADV on Con,Dex and Str saves Increase AOE by 3m/level X

name: Witch Bolt
text: Action Deal 1d12+4 lightning damage on hit, and deal 1d12+4 lightning damage every subsequent turn by activating the tether Select +1 target/level X X

name: Wither and Bloom
text: Action CON Deal 1d12 poison damage on enemies in a large AOE, and heals allies in the AOE for 1D12 Increase healing and damage by 1d12/level X X

name: Zephyr Movement
text: Bonus 3 turns You ignore Opportunity attacks. When you deal damage to another creature, you swap places with your target No upcasting X X
